description:
In this course titled ' Heal Your Arthritis Now Using Self Hypnosis And Imagery.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • What are the causes of arthritis?
  • Find out how hypnosis can accelerate your healing with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations.
You will be able to reduce your arthritis pain instantly using powerful imagery , self hypnosis , positive visualizations and affirmations You will be able to reduce stress, sleep problems, depression and negative thinking using powerful affirmations which is given as a bonus along with the lecture .This course is very useful for those are mentally and physically suffering from the affects of arthritis and general body pains.This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 10 lectures in English It is ideal for everyone who want to get over arthritis painThis course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:What Is Arthritis?

Lecture3:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture4:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture5:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture6:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture7:Visualization Exercise: Space Visualization

Lecture8:Summary

Lecture9:Bonus - Audio File On General Healing

Lecture 10: Bonus Affirmations For Depression , Sound Sleep And Stress
title: Heal Your Arthritis Now Using Self Hypnosis And Imagery
